root.name: pointLight()
root.description: Adds a point light. Lights need to be included in the draw() to remain persistent in a looping program. Placing them in the setup() of a looping program will cause them to only have an effect the first time through the loop. The red, green, and blue parameters are interpreted as RGB values even if the current color mode is set to HSB. The x, y, and z parameters set the position of the light.
